title: Less than a dust speck, but essential for the body
Mediterranean Grape–Apricot Salad
ingredients: 50 g grapes (≈10 grapes), 30 g apricot (≈1 small), 10 g pomegranate seeds (≈1 tbsp), 10 g mint leaves (≈2 sprigs), lemon juice (squeeze)
directions: Toss fruit with mint and lemon juice. Chill before serving.

title: Indian Mango–Papaya Bowl
ingredients: 40 g mango (≈⅕ medium), 40 g papaya (≈⅕ cup cubes), 10 g guava (≈¼ guava), 10 g lime juice (≈½ lime), pinch of black salt & chili (optional)
directions: Mix fruit, drizzle lime, sprinkle spice.
healthy_notes: Supports digestion (papain in papaya, fiber in guava).

title: American Apple–Blueberry Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 50 g apple (≈¼ medium, diced), 30 g blueberries (≈¼ cup), 20 g Greek yogurt (≈1 tbsp), dash of cinnamon
directions: Layer apple, berries, and yogurt. Sprinkle cinnamon.
healthy_notes: Protein + probiotics from yogurt, antioxidants from blueberries.

title: Japanese Kiwi–Persimmon Mix
ingredients: 40 g kiwi (≈½ kiwi), 40 g persimmon (≈¼ medium), 10 g mandarin orange (≈1–2 segments), 10 g sesame seeds (≈2 tsp)
directions: Combine fruits and sprinkle sesame on top.
healthy_notes: Vitamin C boost (kiwi, mandarin) and beta-carotene (persimmon).

title: Caribbean Soursop–Pineapple Cooler
ingredients: 40 g soursop pulp (≈⅕ fruit), 40 g pineapple (≈⅓ cup chunks), 20 g coconut water (≈1 tbsp + splash)
directions: Lightly blend to a smooth, slightly chunky drink.
healthy_notes: Hydrating, electrolytes from coconut water, vitamin C-rich.

title: SE Asian Dragon Fruit–Rambutan Bowl
ingredients: 50 g dragon fruit (≈⅙ medium fruit, cubed), 40 g rambutan (≈2 fruits, peeled & seeded), 10 g passionfruit pulp (≈½ fruit)
directions: Toss together, spoon passionfruit pulp on top.
healthy_notes: Light, vitamin-packed tropical mix with fiber and antioxidants.

title: Brazilian Passionfruit–Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 40 g passionfruit pulp (≈2 fruits), 40 g banana (≈⅓ medium), 20 g water or milk (≈1½ tbsp)
healthy_notes: Balanced carbs for energy and vitamin C from passionfruit.

title: American Apple–Cinnamon Oat Bowl
ingredients: 40 g apple (≈¼ medium, diced), 40 g cooked oats (≈2 tbsp dry oats, cooked), 15 g blueberries (≈1 tbsp or ~10 berries), 5 g walnuts (≈1 tsp, chopped), cinnamon (pinch)
directions: Mix warm oats with apple, blueberries, and walnuts. Sprinkle cinnamon.
healthy_notes: Whole-grain fiber + antioxidants for steady energy.

title: American Peach–Barley Breakfast Cup
ingredients: 40 g cooked barley (≈1 tbsp dry barley, cooked), 35 g peach (≈¼ peach, diced), 15 g strawberry (≈1 small), 10 g Greek yogurt (≈1 tsp)
directions: Layer barley, fruit, and yogurt in a cup. Serve chilled.

title: American Cherry–Millet Porridge
ingredients: 45 g cooked millet (≈2 tbsp dry millet, cooked), 35 g cherries (≈4 cherries, pitted), 15 g banana (≈⅛ banana), 5 g almond slivers (≈1 tsp)
directions: Stir cooked millet with banana and cherries. Sprinkle almonds.
healthy_notes: Millet provides magnesium, cherries add antioxidants.
